body.description: Get healthy-looking, radiant skin with Gold Bond Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion for visibly dry skin. Its triple action formula gently exfoliates, hydrates and locks in moisture for 24 hours. You won't even know it's there while it nurtures your skin with seven nourishing moisturizers and three vitamins. Containing coconut oil, cocoa butter, and African shea butter, this moisturizing lotion penetrates skin 10 surface layers deep and helps prevent visibly dry skin from coming back. DIRECTIONS: Apply liberally to skin as often as needed. Reapply to increase level of moisturization and keep visibly dry skin from coming back.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Give Skin the Deep Moisture and Nourishment It Craves Unique Moisturizing Blend Every Gold Bond Radiance Renewal product is made with a rich blend of moisturizers and hydrating oils to nourish visibly dry skin. 24 Hour Hydration Hydrate dry skin and help keep it from coming back. Gold Bond lotion and creams moisturize skin for 24 hours. 7 Moisturizers + 3 Vitamins Reveal your skin’s natural radiance. Gold Bond Radiance Renewal is formulated with 7 moisturizers and 3 vitamins to give skin nourishing hydration.

Give Skin the Deep Moisture and Nourishment It Craves What are the key ingredients in this body lotion? Gold Bond Radiance Renewal Lotion and Cream features coconut oil and African shea butter to help seal in moisture, plus cocoa butter to help retain moisture. Is Gold Bond Radiance Renewal dermatologist-tested? This lotion for visibly dry skin has been clinically tested by dermatologists. Gold Bond Lotion is also not tested on animals. Can this body cream be used on the face? Although it’s non-greasy, Gold Bond Radiance Renewal Cream and Lotion is intended for body and hands. For dry skin on face, try Gold Bond Pure Moisture Lotion. See the chart below for more information.

See It Now See It Now See It Now Why You’ll Love It Gently exfoliates dry skin while it nourishes. Gently exfoliates dry skin while it nourishes. Ultra-lightweight daily body and face lotion is clinically shown to hydrate skin for 24 hours. Dermatologist Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ 24 Hour Moisture ✓ ✓ ✓ Non-Greasy ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so I first tried this Gold Bond Radiance Renewal Ultimate Hydrating Lotion last year when the pandemic had us washing our hands many times a day through the winter. I worked in a lab, and the gloves were drying my hands even worse. One of my co-workers let me try this stuff, and it was amazing!!! It instantly brought moisture to my dry, cracking skin, and it wasn’t greasy! I actually said, “Wow, oh, my gosh, look!!!” It instantly brought life back to my dry hands, and it didn’t hurt to move them because they were so chapped any more. It was instantly better.I bought my own bottle here, and it’s still amazing! If you need to put on latex/nitrile gloves after using this lotion, you can do it, because it doesn’t make you greasy. It’s amazing, and I believe that I will use this stuff to the last drop! Seriously, any other lotion I’ve tried makes your hands sticky or greasy, but this does none of that. This stuff is the best. You have a slightly silky touch after using it. It’s nourishing. If you use it on your legs, your legs don’t stick to your pant legs, either. I tried it! Perfect product…Also, I hate scents in any lotion. This has a very slight smell. It smells a tiny bit like coconut. That’s not bad! Natural is the best.I was asked to rate how easy it is to spread. It’s not quite as easy as other lotions to spread. It is dense, and if you’re looking to spread it over hairy arms, you will need a comb. Either that, or you could spread it on your slightly wet body after a shower/bath. I think that would solve the difficulty spreading issue. I think that it absorbs into the skin so nicely. The skin does not look oily after rubbing it in. I think the formulation is a real winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying that all the gold bond lotions that I've tried have been pretty freaking fantastic. What makes this one my favorite is that other only does it make my skin soft and shiny but it smells heavenly! Often times in thw summer months I don't use body sprays or perfumes so this lotion is ideal as it smells delicious and gives my skin the moisture it needs. My ONLY complaint is that when I near the end of every bottle, I have to literally cut them open with a knife and scoop out what remains with a spatula because it's so thick. Seriously, if you do this you'll see that SO MUCH is being wasted by simply tossing it away when the pump stops working. I get at least 1/2 cup of this lotiony goodness by slicing and scraping what's otherwise left behind. I am not overly fond of plastic jars for healty and beauty products but in this case I would prefer it. The thickness of this lotion is wonderful but it really requires different packaging to avoid serious waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more dry hands
reviews.reviewText: So I’ve been looking for a decent lotion for the past couple of years. After trying multiple brands and getting lackluster results, semi dry hands with multiple applications, I used some of my cousins Gold Bond while out visiting. Put it on just once and my hands actually felt soft and smooth for hours. As long as there are no changes in quality, I’ll be going with GB from here on out. This lotion goes on nice and thick, gives relief as soon as I put it on, and looks as if it will last for quite some time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Golden Hydration with a Minor Setback - Gold Bond Radiance Renewal Lotion 🌟
reviews.reviewText: Gold Bond Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion offers a remarkable solution for visibly dry skin, with just a minor caveat to consider. Here’s the breakdown:💦 Hydration: The lotion lives up to its name, providing long-lasting hydration that significantly improves the appearance of dry skin. The effects are visible, giving skin a renewed and healthy radiance.👪 Family Size: The 20 oz. size is quite generous, making it suitable for family use. It’s great to have a skincare product that can be shared among family members without fear of running out quickly.💆 Skin Feel: The lotion absorbs quickly, leaving skin feeling soft, smooth, and non-greasy. It’s a pleasant experience that makes you want to reach for the lotion regularly.However, there’s a slight area of improvement:👃 Scent: While not overwhelming, the fragrance of the lotion is a bit distinctive and might not appeal to everyone. It’s not a deal-breaker, but it could be a factor for those sensitive to scents.In conclusion, Gold Bond Radiance Renewal Hydrating Lotion earns a solid 5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. It delivers excellent hydration for visibly dry skin, and despite the unique scent, its benefits far outweigh this minor issue. It’s a worthy addition to your skincare routine if you’re looking to rejuvenate your skin’s radiance.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love thos lotion. It's thick and moisturizing with a great scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good lotion, smells and spreads easy, long lasting too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my absolute favorite lotion. It goes on so smoothly and feels silky. I love the smell also. It stays on your skin I can feel it on my skin for hours after I put it on. Not sticky like a lot of lotions can be. Your skin looks and feels better almost immediately.
excelente crema! te deja la piel muy bien hidratada y tiene un olor muy ligero :)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 18, 2022

reviews.reviewText: Es super ligera. Nada grasosa y se absorbe rápidamente. Además, es buena para la elasticidad de la piel
Yo tengo las manos súper deshechas porque me las lavo muy seguido y sólo esta crema me ha ayudado a repararlas.
El producto llegó con el envase dañado, y derramado. No se puede usar por riesgo de contaminación del producto debido que el envase se abrió.
